we all gathered in the apartment for some drinks .

output.sentences: We had a night of fun.
We gathered at an apartment and had some drinks.
Some guy was thinking it'd be funny to put his head in a vice.
A friend offered a sip of some ails.
It was a good time, and we got goofy that night.
